post.title: BizTalk 2004 Beta
post.content: I just sat thru the flash demo for BizTalk Server 2004. While it’s pretty fluffy, it did show glimpses of the new BTS tools integrated into VS.NET and integration with InfoPath for supporting human based workflows. Cool stuff. Downloading from MSDN Subscriber Downloads as I blog.
